title: Scrapbook Adhesives E-Z Runner Permanent Adhesive Dispenser, 33 Feet-Set of 6 - 01644-MP
description: The EZ Runner is designed to provide customers with an easy to use dispenser. The permanent adhesive gives a smooth, fast and touch free application without additional liners to be removed. Permanent strips can be used perfectly for creating scrapbooks, cards, school projects, presentation boards, etc. with an easy application in curves, circles, and lines. The nonplastic liner is unbreakable and is designed to utilize low waste and recyclable refill cartridges. Heat emboss the adhesive or wear it outside and decorate with foils or glitter.
